alfredsnippet.snippet:
ZestyÂ provides healthy, delicious food experiences from the best local restaurants.

Curated by in-house dietitians, Zesty works with hundreds of healthy, high quality Bay Area restaurants such as Souvla, Namu Gaji, Nopalito, and DOSA, providing nutrition facts on every dish. Every meal is delivered by Zesty's own Catering Captains, offering all the reliability and service quality of an in-house caterer as well as the variety of dozens of cuisines. Zesty works with hundreds of companies including Twitch, Quantcast, Box, and TechCrunch, serving breakfasts, lunches, dinners, happy hours and special events.
alfredsnippet.name: Zesty - Blurb
